name: Apachecassandra
postInstallNotes: DC/OS Apache Cassandra has been successfully installed!
postUninstallNotes: DC/OS Apache Cassandra service has been uninstalled.
preInstallNotes: DC/OS Cassandra Service default configuration with minmum configurations 1 node with 1.5 CPU, 537MB of memory and 900MB of disk for running Cassandra Nodes. And, 1 node with 0.5 CPU shares, 512MB of memory for running the service scheduler.
